test_prompts.text: Could you please illuminate the primary living area?

Please regulate the indoor climate to a steady twenty-two degrees Celsius.
Ajustez la consigne de température du thermostat principal à dix-neuf degrés.

Augmentez légèrement la température ambiante, s'il vous plaît.

Report the latest index reading concerning particulate matter concentration indoors.

Continue playback of the audio track from the point of interruption.

Advance the music queue to the subsequent selection.
Passez au morceau suivant dans la liste de lecture.
Return to the beginning of the track that played prior to this one.
